00029 namespace Utilities.Cisco
00030 {
00034     public class InputItem
00035     {
00036         #region Constructor
00037 
00041         public InputItem()
00042         {
00043         }
00044 
00045         #endregion
00046 
00047         #region Properties
00048 
00052         public string DisplayName { get; set; }
00053 
00057         public string QueryStringParam { get; set; }
00058 
00062         public string DefaultValue { get; set; }
00063 
00067         public InputFlag InputFlags { get; set; }
00068 
00069         #endregion
00070 
00071         #region Overridden Functions
00072 
00073         public override string ToString()
00074         {
00075             try
00076             {
00077                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00078                 Builder.Append("<InputItem><DisplayName>").Append(DisplayName).Append("</DisplayName><QueryStringParam>")
00079                     .Append(QueryStringParam).Append("</QueryStringParam><DefaultValue>").Append(DefaultValue)
00080                     .Append("</DefaultValue><InputFlags>");
00081                 if (InputFlags == InputFlag.ASCII)
00082                 {
00083                     Builder.Append("A");
00084                 }
00085                 else if (InputFlags == InputFlag.TelephoneNumber)
00086                 {
00087                     Builder.Append("T");
00088                 }
00089                 else if (InputFlags == InputFlag.Numeric)
00090                 {
00091                     Builder.Append("N");
00092                 }
00093                 else if (InputFlags == InputFlag.Equation)
00094                 {
00095                     Builder.Append("E");
00096                 }
00097                 else if (InputFlags == InputFlag.Uppercase)
00098                 {
00099                     Builder.Append("U");
00100                 }
00101                 else if (InputFlags == InputFlag.Lowercase)
00102                 {
00103                     Builder.Append("L");
00104                 }
00105                 else if (InputFlags == InputFlag.Password)
00106                 {
00107                     Builder.Append("P");
00108                 }
00109                 Builder.Append("</InputFlags></InputItem>");
00110                 return Builder.ToString();
00111             }
00112             catch { throw; }
00113         }
00114 
00115         #endregion
00116     }
00117 }
